name: The Immortal (itch)
description:
This is my entry for Mini Jam 108, where the required limitation was "everything dies in one hit". If you run into slowdown on the web player, you can try one of the native binaries below (or the .tic file if you have TIC-80).

Navigate the dungeon, defeating waves of enemies, and slay The Immortal, with the help of a relic. Attack enemies by running into them. If you hit them in the center, you'll fall and lose a retry! Try to hit enemies off center.

Default controls (assuming keyboard or Xbox controller):

KeyboardXboxActionArrow keys
D-pad/Left analog stick
MoveS key
Y button
Pause

You can configure these controls by pressing the Escape key, then navigating to "options", then "setup gamepad".
